item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Parameters
width: Width of the Map height: Height of the Map address: Address on which the viewport will be centered. latitude: Point on which the viewport will be centered. If not given and no markers are defined the viewport defaults to world view. longitude: Same as above but for longitude… zoom: Zoom value from 1 to 19 where 19 is the greatest and 1 the smallest. html: Content that will be shown within the info window for this marker. popup: If true the info window for this marker will be shown when the map finished loading. If “html” is empty this option will be ignored. controls: A simple array of string values representing the function names (without “()”) to add controls. Please refer to the Google Maps API for possible values. If empty the default map controls will be applied. scrollwheel: Set to false to disable zooming with your mouses scrollwheel. If “controls” is not set this option will be ignored (because default map controls are applied). maptype: Predefined variable for setting the map type. Please refer to the Google Maps API for possible values. marker: Set to false to disable display a marker in the viewport
Simple Map Displays a simple map with controls and adds one marker. The viewport gets centered automatically. [[gmap latitude="47.660937" longitude="9.569803"]] [gmap latitude="47.660937" longitude="9.569803"]
Different Map Type Displays a simple map with address and a different map type. Available choices for map types: ‘HYBRID’, ‘SATELLITE’, ‘ROADMAP’ or ‘TERRAIN’ [[gmap latitude="47.660937" longitude="9.569803" html="Tettnang, Germany" maptype="ROADMAP" zoom="10"]] [gmap latitude="47.660937" longitude="9.569803" html="Tettnang, Germany" maptype="ROADMAP" zoom="5"]
Map With Address you can use address instead of latitude/longitude. gMap automatically geocodes the given string and places a marker and center the viewport. [[gmap address="Tettnang, Germany" html="Tettnang, Germany" maptype="HYBRID" zoom="9"]] [gmap address="Tettnang, Germany" html="Tettnang, Germany" maptype="HYBRID" zoom="9"]
Map with Disabled Controls Displays a simple map with controls and adds one marker. The viewport gets centered automatically. [[gmap latitude="47.660937" longitude="9.569803" controls="false"]] [gmap latitude="47.660937" longitude="9.569803" controls="false"]

item.title: Alert & Block Messages
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Alert Messages
[warning_alert]Holy guacamole! Best check yo self, you’re not looking too good.[/warning_alert] [error_alert]Oh snap! Change this and that and try again.[/error_alert] [info_alert]Heads up! This is an alert that needs your attention, but it’s not a huge priority just yet.[/info_alert] [success_alert]Well done! You successfully read this alert message.[/success_alert]
Block Messages
[warning_box]Holy guacamole! Best check yo self, youre not looking too good. [/warning_box] [error_box]Oh snap! Change this and that and try again.[/error_box] [info_box]Heads up! This is an alert that needs your attention, but it’s not a huge priority just yet.[/info_box] [success_box]Well done! You successfully read this alert message.[/success_box]

item.title: Buttons

Large Buttons

item.title: Typography Shortcodes
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Dividers
A physical separators between content: Orci enim tincidunt odio, vitae tempus ipsum nibh quis est. Donec vehicula nisi sed dolor volutpat commodo. Nullam scelerisque varius tellus, in dapibus velit aliquet sit amet. 
[[divider]]
[divider] Orci enim tincidunt odio, vitae tempus ipsum nibh quis est. Donec vehicula nisi sed dolor volutpat commodo. Nullam scelerisque varius tellus, in dapibus velit aliquet sit amet. 
[[dividertop]]
[dividertop] Orci enim tincidunt odio, vitae tempus ipsum nibh quis est. Donec vehicula nisi sed dolor volutpat commodo. Nullam scelerisque varius tellus, in dapibus velit aliquet sit amet.
Pull Quotes
Pull Quotes are fun. They are an easy way to show off your new design. They will add a professional feeling to your artices. 
[ pullquote_right]Insert your text here[/pullquote_right]

item.title: Google Maps
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Parameters
  • width: Width of the Map
  • height: Height of the Map
  • address: Address on which the viewport will be centered.
  • latitude: Point on which the viewport will be centered. If not given and no markers are defined the viewport defaults to world view.
  • longitude: Same as above but for longitude…
  • zoom: Zoom value from 1 to 19 where 19 is the greatest and 1 the smallest.
  • html: Content that will be shown within the info window for this marker.
  • popup: If true the info window for this marker will be shown when the map finished loading. If “html” is empty this option will be ignored.
  • controls: A simple array of string values representing the function names (without “()”) to add controls. Please refer to the Google Maps API for possible values. If empty the default map controls will be applied.
  • scrollwheel: Set to false to disable zooming with your mouses scrollwheel. If “controls” is not set this option will be ignored (because default map controls are applied).
  • maptype: Predefined variable for setting the map type. Please refer to the Google Maps API for possible values.
  • marker: Set to false to disable display a marker in the viewport
Simple Map
Displays a simple map with controls and adds one marker. The viewport gets centered automatically. 
[[gmap latitude="47.660937" longitude="9.569803"]]
[gmap latitude="47.660937" longitude="9.569803"]  
Different Map Type
Displays a simple map with address and a different map type. Available choices for map types: 'HYBRID', 'SATELLITE', 'ROADMAP' or 'TERRAIN' 
[[gmap latitude="47.660937" longitude="9.569803" html="Tettnang, Germany" maptype="ROADMAP"  zoom="10"]]
[gmap latitude="47.660937" longitude="9.569803" html="Tettnang, Germany" maptype="ROADMAP" zoom="5"]  
Map With Address
you can use address instead of latitude/longitude. gMap automatically geocodes the given string and places a marker and center the viewport. 
[[gmap address="Tettnang, Germany" html="Tettnang, Germany" maptype="HYBRID" zoom="9"]]
[gmap address="Tettnang, Germany" html="Tettnang, Germany" maptype="HYBRID" zoom="9"]  
Map with Disabled Controls
Displays a simple map with controls and adds one marker. The viewport gets centered automatically. 
[[gmap latitude="47.660937" longitude="9.569803" controls="false"]]
[gmap latitude="47.660937" longitude="9.569803" controls="false"]

item.title: Contact Us
item.dc:creator: admin
